entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 7:47AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AREAS OF FOG, LOCALLY DENSE, THROUGH THIS MORNING... Local observations indicate areas of fog across much of southeast Alabama, southern Georgia, and the Florida Panhandle and Big Bend. Area webcams and observations show that some of this fog has been locally dense. The fog will linger over the next couple hours before eventually dissipating later this morning.
